document.full_text: belgrade-born author tea obreht was the surprise winner on wednesday of britain's orange prize for fiction with her debut novel "the tiger's wife," a mystical, magical examination of the recent conflicts in the balkans.
document.title: obreht youngest winner of uk's orange fiction prize
lines_and_colors: belgrade-born author tea obreht was the surprise winner on wednesday of britain's orange prize for fiction with her debut novel "the tiger's wife," a mystical, magical examination of the recent conflicts in the balkans.
